name: Portal Rescue
description:
Made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 49 COMPO
Theme: Unstable

This game is a combination of Pong, Portal, and Angry Birds. 
You play as 2 aliens trying to rescue your friend from a space jail. Using a comet to destroy the teleportation jammers in each level and clear any blocks above your friend. The comet will pass through your portal but it can also be caught using energy. You don't have an unlimited amount so use it when needed. 

*Note: Metal boxes on last 2 levels can't be broken, they must be knocked away.

Game Controls
Move left portal - W & S (or Z & S for AZERTY keyboards
Move right portal - Up & Down Arrow key
Activate Catching (Holds comet and resets it's angle of movement) - Space

Mute - M
Full Screen - F
Reset Level - R
